name: airshot (Helix9)
description:
[Quick Version]
  • Left Click - Hold to charge speed, release to fly
  • Right Click - Hold to stabilize drone when spinning out or after being shot
[Description]

In this vertical slice, you must take out the turrets standing on the tops of the towers by flying into them with your drone and obliterating them- all while avoiding their speeding bullets!

To control the drone, hold the left-mouse button to charge your velocity, and shoot out to speed through the air and fly to your hearts content. But should you run into a wall and spin out, stabilize the drone by holding the right-mouse to regain control.

When destroying more enemies, you gain a multiplier which gives you more speed, but less control. crashing will reset your multiplier to zero.

Try to destroy the enemies as soon as possible and get the best time!

Warning! Regrettably, on chrome, a glitch occasionally jumps the mouse position and makes it hard to control (in an already hard to control game), if possible, you can use Firefox or other Unity-equipped browsers to have a more consistent experience.
